ai-atk-s0404a1:70_2: When the monks saw him, he thought of the recitation of the Monastic Code in this way: “Today, I’ll look after one person who is immoral, and when he saw that person, he will be silent.”
ai-atk-s0404a1:70_5: he should not wait for a day,
ai-atk-s0404a1:70_6: After saying, “Ānanda, the assembly is not pure, and it is not impure,” and the assembly said, “Ānanda, the gathering is impure.”
ai-atk-s0404a1:71_0: The second sub-chapter on great fire is finished.
